nodes.text: Churnis was a member of the Imperial Guard in the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. At the time of the Battle of Corellia, he was on the planet guarding the Imperial Moff Alvon Zamar.

Churnis appears in the Imperial Agent class mission "Eve of Destruction" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. He can be killed by players upon meeting him, but if they do so, a second NPC also named "Imperial Guard Churnis" will be guarding Moff Zamar inside his shuttle.
